main.description: Goal is to assemble together and connect the most awesome features and libraries creating an efficient ecosystem to speed up and simplify the development.
main.uiDesc: We carefully crafted the most important components you need to bootstrap your development. Our UI Kit is framework-agnostic.
main.authModelDesc: Now front-end authentication and authorization are just a matter of a configuration. Auth & Security Concepts.
